Bleeding

spell id [id]: 186

damage [damage]: 8192

casting time [casttime]: 100%
area of effect [aoe_s]: Caster

Cause Affliction: Bleed
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune])
The priest utters a prayer most holy and a heathen is struck by a divine bolt. This prayer is imbued with nature and vines will rise from the ground and drag the target with its sharp thorns, causing severe bleeding in the process.
